descr.landingPage: An application to easily and conveniently manage all areas of life. Shopping lists, suggestions, tasks, children, pets, vacations, daily routines, etc.

landingPage.text: Created to organize everything in one’s life as simply as possible.

sayings.text: Don’t let the little things distract you from the big ones.
sayings.author: Joachim Pürcher

sayings.text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
sayings.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

sayings.text: We only see the world once, in childhood. The rest is memory.
sayings.author: Louise Glück

sayings.text: Simplicity is the highest form of perfection.
sayings.author: Stephe Jobs

landingPage.infoText: Simplify this life – created to help organize life more easily

help.infoTextOne: Who doesn’t know it? You’re out and about and suddenly you have an idea...
ideasList: The idea of what to give your child for their birthday...
Which groceries you still need for tonight...
Tasks that were postponed and still need to be done...
help.organizeInfo: Of course, there are many apps that already let you do everything. However, many of these apps are packed with functions, options, settings, and features you don’t actually need. The goal of 'Simplify this life' is to make the essentials as simple and user-friendly as possible. Only what’s necessary, clearly presented.
help.steve: Steve Jobs once said: 'Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication,' which is why a butterfly adorns the app. It is simple in its being yet highly complex in its nature and diversity.
help.infoTextThree: From this idea, 'Simplify this life' was created.
help.lifeButton: Almost everything is controlled via the so-called 'Life Button' in the center. Its action always relates to the currently open content — just give it a try.
help.featuresText: Currently, the app includes a simple shopping list, a to-do list, and a family button to view all information about family members at a glance.

shopping.text: Using the Life Button (the plus), you open the input field to add purchases. The first field defines the amount and unit, the second field the name.
featureList: In the background, you can see your most recent and frequent purchases

cookieBanner.textOne: We use cookies to ensure smooth operation and security — e.g., for authentication processes and various in-app features. These cookies are absolutely necessary to access this application.
cookieBanner.textTwo: We also use optional cookies to improve user experience, such as saving the selected color scheme, chosen language, etc. These cookies are optional and not required to use the app.
